blogPost.excerpt: Eco puts your money back to work for you. It's a single balance that lets you spend, send, save and make money at the same time. Earn 2.5-5% on your balance, plus get 5% cashback at merchants. And, soon, pay bills and send money to friends for more rewards.
blogPost.body: Eco puts your money back to work for you. It's a single balance that lets you spend, send, save and make money at the same time. Earn 2.5-5% on your balance, plus get 5% cashback at merchants. And, soon, pay bills and send money to friends for more rewards.
blogPost.title: The Eco App - One simple balance for saving, spending, and making money.
blogPost.author: Andy Bromberg

localize.description: Eco让你的钱重新为你工作。它是一个单一的余额，让你消费，发送，储蓄和赚钱在同一时间。赚取2.5-5%的余额，并在商家获得5%的现金回馈。而且，很快就可以支付账单和寄钱给朋友，获得更多奖励。
localize.tagline: 储蓄、消费、赚钱的一个简单平衡。

localize.description: Eco讓你的錢重新爲你工作。它是一個單一的餘額，讓你消費，發送，儲蓄和賺錢在同一時間。賺取2.5-5%的餘額，並在商家獲得5%的現金回饋。而且，很快就可以支付賬單和寄錢給朋友，獲得更多獎勵。
localize.tagline: 儲蓄、消費、賺錢的一個簡單平衡。

previous.excerpt: Yep, it's one of those stash services again. But I don't think there's been one focused only on resources to supercharge designers, entrepreneurs, founders, indie-makers, side-hustlers and anyone building digital products or services. Lifetime access🎉
previous.title: Zupermaker - 1000+ tools & resources to grow and supercharge your skills

localize.description: 是的，这又是那些藏匿服务之一。但我认为还没有一个只专注于资源，为设计师、创业者、创始人、独立制作人、副业者和任何构建数字产品或服务的人提供超级充电。终身访问🎉
localize.tagline: 1000+工具和资源，让你的技能得到成长和提升。

localize.description: 是的，這又是那些藏匿服務之一。但我認爲還沒有一個只專注於資源，爲設計師、創業者、創始人、獨立製作人、副業者和任何構建數字產品或服務的人提供超級充電。終身訪問🎉
localize.tagline: 1000+工具和資源，讓你的技能得到成長和提升。

next.excerpt: B2B buyers are tired of the traditional sales process and want a B2C like buying experience. Deal Rooms transform your sales process to sell B2B buyers how they want to be sold. Open to close, deal rooms help your sales teams sell more and sell fast.
next.title: Referenceable - Deal rooms create B2C like buying experiences for B2B buyers

localize.description: B2B买家已经厌倦了传统的销售流程，他们希望获得类似B2C的购买体验。Deal Rooms将改变您的销售流程，以B2B买家想要的方式进行销售。从开放到关闭，交易室帮助您的销售团队卖得更多，卖得更快。
localize.tagline: 交易室为B2B买家创造类似B2C的购买体验

localize.description: B2B買家已經厭倦了傳統的銷售流程，他們希望獲得類似B2C的購買體驗。Deal Rooms將改變您的銷售流程，以B2B買家想要的方式進行銷售。從開放到關閉，交易室幫助您的銷售團隊賣得更多，賣得更快。
localize.tagline: 交易室爲B2B買家創造類似B2C的購買體驗
